description:
Due to humanity obtaining the data technology that has evolved to a great amount - called "Mana" - the human race is able to subjugate all wars, starvation, pollution, and other problems on Earth by using its power, which is similar to magic. Earth has obtained the utopia of complete peace and no wants.
First princess of the Misurugi Empire, http://anidb.net/ch69121 [Angelize]. As with everyone else, she also had no wants or worries. She was celebrated by the people of the empire, and was supposed to wear the crown. However, she realizes the shocking truth that she is a Norma. "Norma": An irregular existence that cannot use Mana, and are treated as heretics and as "things" rather than people. Having everything stolen from her, she isolates herself on a remote island.
What was waiting for her there was a fateful meeting with a group of Norma girls who know nothing but battle. The girls spend their days riding humanoid robot weapons called "Barameiru" hunting giant dragons that have come from another dimension to invade. Having her name taken from her, what will soldier Ange see at the end of the fight? What can she believe in? What will she obtain? The story of a single girl`s fortitude starts now.
Source: ANN
Note: The first episode received an early screening at a special event held at Shinjuku Milano on 23.09.2014. The regular TV broadcast started on 05.10.2014.

REGULAR.description:
With the magic-like power of the highly advanced information technology "Mana", humanity has solved many of its woes: war, hunger, pollution. It had finally achieved a peaceful and unimpaired life. Princess Angelise of the Misurugi Empire was, as everyone else, unimpaired, and was ready to receive the crown with the congratulations of her people.
Source: crunchyroll

Angelise is at odds with the many Norma girls she meets at Arzenal. She is unable to accept such a reality. Her stubborn insistence that she is Princess Angelise leads to tragedy.
Source: crunchyroll

Encounters with DRAGONs and arudous battles as a Para-mail rider. Verbal abuse from the Norma. Having been placed in such a cruel reality, Ange chooses to go to battle in the Vilkiss in order to die.
Source: crunchyroll

Ange chooses to accept that she is a Norma, and to live as a soldier. But for what? Her impudence and disregard for others agitates those who despise her, and she becomes the target of bullying and conspiracies.
Source: crunchyroll

Ange, shipwrecked, is saved by a mysterious man named Tusk. They spend several days alone together. Ange remains confused as to where she is, and conflicted as to whether or not she should abandon her life as a Norma. But it does not seem she will be allowed to stay here.
Source: crunchyroll

Angelise`s top maid in the Misurugi Empire Momoka, comes to Arzenal. Forced to face the past that she`d already once given up, Ange is flustered. Despite Momoka`s unwavering commitment to her, Ange can`t help but be mean.
Source: crunchyroll

With Ange`s reckless behavior, the squad loses its team cohesion. Captain Salia is more stressed than ever, and she finally explodes. Salia`s squad is faced with an attack by a new, large DRAGON.
Source: crunchyroll

Ange is troubled by a distress call from her younger sister, Sylvia. Arzenal holds its once-a-year Mermaid Festival. In the background, Ange and Hilda are plotting away.
Source: crunchyroll

Having escaped Arzenal, Ange finds her way into the Misurugi Empire to rescue her sister, Sylvia. Hilda at long last is reunited with her mother. But when they get home, they`re both met with trials.
Source: crunchyroll

Ange is captured after facing off with brother Sylvia and sister Sylvia in the Misurugi Empire. After experiencing the unbelievable insanity and mocking of the people of Misurugi, she leaves her home for good.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 絞首台からサヨナラを

REGULAR.description:
A massive DRAGON force attacks from above Arzenal. As the battle continues without Ange and Hilda, Salia erupts in emotion regarding Salia and the Villkiss.
Source: crunchyroll

Ange learns of the tragic past of Jill and the Villkiss, and of the true nature of the world. A mysterious man, Embryo, sneaks forward.
Source: crunchyroll

With Julio`s overwhelming forces, the Para-mail squads are destroyed. Arzenal is overtaken, and amidst the fighting, Ange takes towards Julio.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 武器工廠[アルゼナル], 炎上

REGULAR.description:
Ange and Tusk are whisked away by the Villkiss to an incomprehensible world.
Source: crunchyroll

Ange is abducted by a family of DRAGONs. She meets their princess, and learns the true nature of their worlds.
Source: crunchyroll

Ange rejects Sara`s plea that they fight together, and they fight for their respective futures at an ancient arena.
Source: crunchyroll

Amidst truth and lies, Ange struggles to decide what to do going forward. Having learned that Aura is in Misurugi underground, the DRAGONs plan a raid on the Misurugi Empire.
Source: crunchyroll

Ange is reunited with Hilda, and they rendezvous with the Aurora. She finds herself at odds with Jill, who is hell-bent on executing Libertus at any cost.
Source: crunchyroll

At the end of a battle, Ange comes face-to-face with Embryo. He presents her with his twisted sense of justice.
Source: crunchyroll

Embryo shows his true character, overwhelming Ange. Meanwhile, there`s friction around Jill regarding Aurora, leading Hilda to take action.
Source: crunchyroll

Ange and Momoka flee from Embryo, but he hunts them down persistently. Amidst the chaos, Chris is in a fight against Hilda and Rosalie.
Source: crunchyroll

Embryo begins creating his new world, and the destruction of the two worlds continues. Sala and Hilda join forces to stop the space-time fusion, but they`re far from a breakthrough. Meanwhile, having lost the people she holds dear, Ange is in despair.
Source: crunchyroll

Amidst the chaos of the space-time merger, Ange finds Aurora. There, along with the others gathered there, she begins the Libertus operation.
Source: crunchyroll

Ange and Sala head towards Aura, while Hilda and Rosalie confront Chris, and Tusk confronts Embryo.
Source: crunchyroll

The world continues to end. Aura guides Tusk and the others beyond space-time to where Ange is.
Source: crunchyroll

SPECIAL.description: Interview conducted by Japanese voice actor Momoka with the creators and producers of CrossAnge.
Q&A with Japanese voice actors at premiere screening

titles.title: クロスアンジュ てんしとりゅうのロンド
Cross Ange: Tenshi to Ryuu no Rondo
Cross Ange: Rondo of Angel and Dragon
クロスアンジュ 天使と竜の輪舞
Крест Анжи: Танец ангела с драконом
